about_the_game:
Bike Park Simulator is a realistic BMX, Dirt Jump, and MTB simulation featuring a large sandbox skatepark, multiple bike types, and fun physics-based riding. Perform tricks, explore diverse terrains, and become the most famous biker in the city!

About Bike Park Simulator

Bike Park Simulator is a realistic BMX, Dirt Jump, and MTB simulation game that lets you experience the thrill of freestyle biking. Choose from three different bike types and explore a massive sandbox skatepark designed for riders of all skill levels. With fun physics-based controls, players can pull off tricks, catch big air, and navigate diverse terrains that challenge your abilities.

Future Updates

Future updates are planned to bring even more features, including new custom locations, a larger selection of bikes with unique paint jobs, and an expanded trick system. Different game modes such as point-scoring time trials and Player vs. CPU challenges are features we are aiming to introduce, giving players even more reasons to ride and become the most famous biker in the city!
